attributes.action: officially recognise pigeon racing as a sport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pigeon Racing is not currently classed as a sport. I wrote to Mr Blair a few years back now, and didn't have much of a response. Keeping racing pigeons, and preparing them for a race takes a lot of time and effort by the owner / keeper of the pigeons. So why Pigeon Racing can't be classed as a sport is beyond me. Please could you take a close look at this, and hopefully change the way it stands now. Thanks

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "officially recognise pigeon racing as a sport."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
